pre_caption: This is a static, wide-angle shot of the River Thames in London. The camera remains still, capturing a scenic view of the cityscape, including landmarks like the Shard and the "Walkie Talkie" building. The only movement comes from the gentle flow of the river and a few boats.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
